1_CD ._.

2_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT most_RBS recent_JJ work_NN on_IN ganja_NN (_( Dr._NNP Prain_NNP 's_POS report_NN of_IN 21st_CD June_NNP 1893_CD )_) it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN ``_`` in_IN India_NNP three_CD narcotic_JJ articles_NNS are_VBP obtained_VBN naturally_RB from_IN hemp_NN ._.
These_DT are_VBP ,_, siddhi_JJ or_CC bhang_NN ,_, charas_NNS ,_, and_CC ganja_NN ._. ''_''
They_PRP are_VBP thus_RB defined_VBN ,_, by_IN Dr._NNP Prain_NNP :_: ``_`` Siddhi_NNP ,_, bhang_NN ,_, subji_NN or_CC patti_NNS are_VBP different_JJ names_NNS applied_VBN to_TO the_DT dry_JJ leaves_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, whether_IN male_NN or_CC female_NN and_CC whether_IN cultivated_VBN or_CC uncultivated._JJ ``_``
Charas_NNP is_VBZ the_DT name_NN applied_VBD to_TO the_DT resinous_JJ matter_NN which_WDT forms_VBZ the_DT active_JJ principle_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN when_WRB collected_VBN separately._NN ``_``
Ganja_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT dried_JJ flowering_NN tops_NNS of_IN cultivated_JJ female_JJ hemp_NN plants_NNS which_WDT have_VBP become_VBN coated_VBN with_IN resin_NN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN having_VBG been_VBN unable_JJ to_TO set_VB seeds_NNS freely_RB ._.
The_DT formation_NN of_IN seeds_NNS is_VBZ prevented_VBN by_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT male_NN plants_NNS ._.
``_`` Three_CD varieties_NNS of_IN ganja_NN are_VBP sold_VBN ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ usually_RB manufactured_VBN by_IN being_VBG trodden_JJ under_IN foot_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT agglutinated_JJ flower-tops_JJ assume_NN a_DT flattened_JJ shape_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ '_POS Flat_JJ ganja_NN ._. '_''
The_DT other_JJ sort_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ not_RB trodden_JJ ,_, but_CC rolled_VBD under_IN loot_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT agglutinated_JJ flower-tops_NNS are_VBP less_RBR closely_RB adherent_JJ ,_, and_CC assume_VB a_DT rounded_JJ shape_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ '_POS Round_NNP ganja_NN ._. '_''
The_DT flower-tops_NNS of_IN ganja_NN detached_VBN from_IN the_DT ._.
twigs_NNS ,_, whether_IN of_IN flat_JJ or_CC of_IN round_NN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN the_DT detachment_NN has_VBZ been_VBN accidental_JJ or_CC deliberate_NN ,_, form_NN '_'' chur_NN '_'' or_CC '_POS Broken_NNP ganja_NN ._. '_''

EVIDENCE_NN OF_IN NORTH-WESTERN_NNP PROVINCES_NNP &_CC OUDH_NNP WITNESSES_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN the_DT HON'BLE_NNP A._NN CADELL_NNP ,_, Member_NNP ,_, Board_NNP of_IN Revenue_NNP ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP Member_NNP of_IN the_DT Board_NNP of_IN Revenue_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN Excise_NNP and_CC Member_NNP of_IN the_DT Provincial_NNP Council_NNP ._.
I_PRP was_VBD eighteen_JJ months_NNS Commissioner_NNP of_IN Excise_NNP in_IN 1883-84_CD ._.
My_PRP$ experience_NN has_VBZ been_VBN largely_RB in_IN settlement_NN work_NN :_: about_IN fourteen_JJ years_NNS in_IN various_JJ districts_NNS ,_, chiefly_NN Allahabad_NNP ,_, Muzaffarnagar_NNP ,_, Banda_NNP and_CC Hamirpur_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP also_RB been_VBN Collector_NNP in_IN three_CD districts_NNS and_CC Commissioner_NNP in_IN two_CD divisions_NNS ._.
I_PRP think_VBP our_PRP$ information_NN regarding_VBG the_DT extent_NN of_IN consumption_NN is_VBZ very_RB defective_JJ owing_VBG to_TO our_PRP$ system_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP am_VBP generally_RB prepared_VBN to_TO accept_VB the_DT figures_NNS given_VBN in_IN Mr._NNP Stoker_NNP 's_POS memorandum_NN ,_, paragraphs_RB 37_CD to_TO 39_CD ._.
But_CC I_PRP think_VBP that_IN his_PRP$ esti-_JJ mate_NN of_IN the_DT average_JJ consumption_NN per_IN man_NN is_VBZ high_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN consumers_NNS is_VBZ probably_RB much_JJ higher_JJR than_IN he_PRP puts_VBZ it_PRP ._.
When_WRB ten_CD years_NNS ago_RB I_PRP made_VBD inquiries_NNS about_IN opium-smoking_JJ ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT great_JJ objections_NNS to_TO the_DT vice_NN urged_VBD was_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD so_RB expensive_JJ that_IN it_PRP almost_RB drove_VBD its_PRP$ vota-_JJ ries_NNS into_IN crime_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB heard_VBN that_IN urged_VBD against_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
I_PRP think_VBP then_RB that_DT Rs_NNP ._.
11-6-6_JJ per_IN annum_NN is_VBZ a_DT figure_NN far_RB above_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN expenditure_NN on_IN these_DT drugs_NNS by_IN consumers_NNS ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB our_PRP$ statistics_NNS are_VBP sufficient_JJ to_TO enable_VB us_PRP accurately_RB to_TO estimate_VB the_DT increase_NN in_IN consumption_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ generally_RB felt_VBN that_IN when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ restriction_NN in_IN one_CD intoxicant_NN ,_, it_PRP leads_VBZ to_TO increase_VB in_IN another_DT ._.
That_DT is_VBZ admitted_VBN in_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP report_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN again_RB and_CC again_RB ad-_JJ mitted_VBN in_IN this_DT province_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_IN since_IN the_DT great_JJ increase_NN in_IN still-head_JJ duty_NN there_EX has_VBZ probably_RB been_VBN considerable_JJ increase_NN in_IN hemp-_JJ drug_NN consumption_NN ,_, just_RB as_IN there_EX was_VBD said_VBD to_TO be_VB decrease_NN when_WRB the_DT extension_NN of_IN the_DT out-still_JJ sys-_JJ tem_NN gave_VBD increased_VBN facilities_NNS for_IN obtaining_VBG liquor_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT two_CD habits_NNS are_VBP to_TO some_DT extent_NN interchangeable_JJ ._.
The_DT raising_NN of_IN the_DT still-head_JJ duty_NN ,_, more_RBR careful_JJ excise_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT abandonment_NN of_IN the_DT out-still_JJ system_NN except_IN in_IN frontier_NN and_CC jun-_JJ gle_NN tracts_NNS are_VBP all_DT causes_NNS pointing_VBG to_TO the_DT probabi-_JJ lity_NN of_IN increase_NN in_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN drugs_NNS ._.
I_PRP may_MD mention_VB in_IN this_DT connection_NN that_IN in_IN 1882-83_CD the_DT total_JJ excise_NN on_IN spirits_NNS was_VBD Re_NNP ._.
1-8-6_JJ per_IN gallon_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN 1890-91_JJ Re_NNP ._.
1-13-11_JJ per_IN gallon_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN 1891-92_JJ ,_, after_IN the_DT increase_NN in_IN still-head_JJ duty_NN Rs_NNP ._.
2-13-8_JJ per_IN gallon_NN on_IN London_NNP proof_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ two_CD were_VBD on_IN unascertained_JJ strength_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD to_TO the_DT advantage_NN of_IN the_DT contractor_NN to_TO take_VB out_RP as_RB high_JJ strength_NN as_IN possible_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT duty_NN was_VBD irre-_JJ spective_NN of_IN strength_NN ._.
The_DT districts_NNS of_IN most_JJS con-_JJ sumption_NN were_VBD the_DT districts_NNS of_IN greatest_JJS skill_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB the_DT strength_NN was_VBD generally_RB well_RB above_IN proof_NN ._.
Perhaps_RB the_DT figure_NN for_IN 1891-92_JJ may_MD be_VB abnormal_JJ ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT bids_NNS for_IN contracts_NNS being_VBG sometimes_RB made_VBN under_IN mistake_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT system_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT permanent_JJ increase_NN is_VBZ doubtless_JJ enormous_JJ ._.
The_DT statistics_NNS have_VBP been_VBN defective_JJ ,_, because_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT revenue_NN reason_NN for_IN having_VBG them_PRP ,_, only_RB statistical_JJ reasons_NNS ._.
We_PRP have_VBP only_RB statistics_NNS of_IN revenue_NN ,_, not_RB of_IN consumption_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT very_RB great_JJ increase_NN in_IN revenue_NN ,_, vide_IN Mr._NNP Stoker_NNP 's_POS me-_JJ morandum_NN ,_, paragraph_NN 42_CD ;_: but_CC my_PRP$ opinion_NN is_VBZ that_IN this_DT is_VBZ more_RBR due_JJ to_TO improved_VBN administration_NN than_IN to_TO increased_VBN consumption_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN Oudh_NNP ._.
Apart_RB from_IN the_DT above_JJ considerations_NNS ,_, I_PRP have_VBP no_DT opinion_NN based_VBN on_IN actual_JJ observation_NN regarding_VBG the_DT increase_NN ._.
Drugs_NNS do_VBP not_RB obtrude_VB themselves_PRP on_IN observation_NN ._.

I_PRP would_MD add_VB that_IN the_DT great_JJ indictment_NN against_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS is_VBZ the_DT asy-_JJ lum_NN statistics_NNS which_WDT were_VBD quoted_VBN at_IN page_NN 6_CD of_IN the_DT Board_NNP 's_POS last_JJ review_NN of_IN the_DT Excise_NNP Report_NNP ._.

And_CC I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ extremely_RB likely_JJ that_IN the_DT system_NN at_IN present_JJ in_IN force_NN is_VBZ capable_JJ of_IN very_RB great_JJ improvement_NN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO acting_VBG up_RP to_TO these_DT principles_NNS and_CC also_RB to_TO getting_VBG increased_JJ revenue_NN ._.

1_CD ._.
As_IN Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Bijnour_NNP Agricultural_NNP Society_NNP from_IN 1880_CD to_TO 1884_CD and_CC as_IN a_DT student_NN of_IN the_DT Royal_NNP Agricultural_NNP College_NNP ,_, Cirencester_NNP ,_, from_IN 1885_CD to_TO 1887_CD ,_, I_PRP had_VBD opportunities_NNS to_TO study_VB the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN agriculturally_RB ,_, while_IN as_IN an_DT ._.

2_CD ._.
These_DT definitions_NNS may_MD be_VB accepted_VBN for_IN this_DT province_NN ._.

3_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.

9_CD ._.
The_DT seed_NN is_VBZ sown_VBN in_IN May_NNP at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 30_CD seers_NNS to_TO the_DT acre_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT plants_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN carefully_RB weeded_VBN ._.
By_IN September_NNP they_PRP usually_RB attain_VBP a_DT height_NN of_IN 12_CD to_TO 14_CD feet_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT hemp_NN the_DT male_NN and_CC female_JJ organs_NNS are_VBP contained_VBN in_IN separate_JJ flowers_NNS and_CC borne_NN on_IN separate_JJ plants_NNS ._.
The_DT male_NN plants_NNS ,_, called_VBN phul_NN bhang_NN ,_, yield_VB the_DT best_JJS fibre_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP cut_VBN a_DT month_NN or_CC six_CD weeks_NNS before_IN the_DT female_NN plants_NNS (_( gul_VB bhang_NN )_) ,_, which_WDT are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO stand_VB until_IN their_PRP$ 6eed_CD ripens_NNS ._.
The_DT stalks_NNS are_VBP laid_VBN in_IN water_NN to_TO promote_VB fermentation_NN ,_, which_WDT allows_VBZ the_DT bark_NN to_TO strip_VB easily_RB ._.
On_IN being_VBG taken_VBN out_RP they_PRP are_VBP beaten_VBN with_IN mallets_NNS to_TO loosen_VB the_DT bark_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ then_RB detached_VBN by_IN hand_NN in_IN strips_NNS ,_, and_CC after_IN a_DT second_JJ beating_NN breaks_VBZ up_RP into_IN a_DT fibre_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP into_IN hanks_NNS for_IN sale_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT places_NNS the_DT fibre_NN is_VBZ boiled_VBN in_IN potash_NN and_CC bleached_VBD before_IN spin-_JJ ning_NN ._.

of_IN the_DT male_JJ population_NN ,_, viz_NN ._.
:40_JJ anniversary_NN of_IN the_DT marriage_NN of_IN Shiva_NNP )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT four_CD Mondays_NNS in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN Shravan_NNP ,_, when_WRB Hindus_NNP keep_VB fast_NN in_IN honour_NN of_IN Shiva_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB a_DT social_JJ custom_NN among_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP to_TO drink_VB bhang_NN or_CC eat_NN majun_NN (_( a_DT sweetmeat_NN containing_VBG bhang_NN )_) on_IN the_DT occasion_NN of_IN the_DT Holi_NNP festival_NN ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN these_DT customs_NNS is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, not_RB regarded_VBN as_IN essential_JJ ._.

42_CD ._.

A_DT Hindu_NNP proverb_NN runs_VBZ ``_`` charas_JJ ne_JJ kaha_NN 'khansi_POS karun_NN ,_, khurah_NN karun_NN ,_, jub_NN bhi_NN na_TO mar_NN to_TO kya_VB karun_VB ?_. '_'' ''_''

41.The_CD moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN any_DT form_NN of_IN hemp_NN may_MD be_VB beneficial_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ effects160_NN all_DT three_CD induce_VBP habits_NNS of_IN laziness_NN and_CC indolence_NN ,_, and_CC immorality_NN and_CC debauchery_NN ._.

In_IN certain_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP produces_VBZ insanity_NN (_( as_IN is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN the_DT reports_NNS and_CC returns_NNS of_IN the_DT several_JJ lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS of_IN these_DT provinces_NNS ,_, as_IN also_RB in_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS which_WDT have_VBP come_VBN under_IN my_PRP$ own_JJ observation_NN )_) of_IN mainly_RB an_DT acute_JJ type_NN of_IN mania_NN and_CC dementia_NN ,_, generally_RB temporary_JJ ._.

Evidence_NN of_IN SAYED_NNP ABDUL_NNP SAMAD_NNP ,_, *_NNP Hakim_NNP ,_, Bareilly_NNP ._.

Bhang_NNP ._.
The_DT bhang_NN plant_NN is_VBZ different_JJ from_IN that_DT of_IN hemp_NN ._.
It_PRP grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB in_IN moist_NN and_CC manured_VBD soil_NN in_IN Bareilly_NNP (_( city_NN )_) and_CC its_PRP$ environs_NNS ._.
The_DT growth_NN is_VBZ dense_JJ and_CC the_DT plants_NNS attain_VBP the_DT height_NN of_IN one_CD yard_NN and_CC resemble_VB the_DT Indian_JJ marigold_NN (_( Tagetes_NNP erecta_RB )_) plant_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ flowers_NNS are_VBP small_JJ and_CC of_IN white_JJ colour_NN ._.
The_DT seeds_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP much_RB smaller_JJR than_IN those_DT of_IN hemp_JJ plants_NNS (_( often_RB )_) drop_NN from_IN the_DT plants_NNS (_( and_CC sink_VB into_IN the_DT ground_NN )_) ,_, and_CC new_JJ plants_NNS grow_VB spontaneously_RB out_IN of_IN them_PRP in_IN those_DT places_NNS in_IN the_DT next_JJ rainy_NN season_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP often_RB seen_VBN wild_JJ bhang_NN and_CC ganja_NN plants_NNS in_IN Bareilly_NNP city_NN in_IN the_DT low_JJ ground_NN on_IN either_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT northern_JJ road_NN near_IN Bahadur_NNP bridge_NN ._.
Early_RB in_IN hot_JJ season_NN in_IN spring_VBG the_DT plants_NNS attain_VBP maturity_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT leaves_NNS are_VBP plucked_VBN by_IN those_DT who_WP consume_VBP or_CC sell_VB them_PRP ._.
Some_DT people_NNS peel_VBP off_IN the_DT bark_NN of_IN the_DT branches_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN and_CC use_VB it_PRP as_IN a_DT drink_NN after_IN grinding_VBG it_PRP in_IN water_NN ._.

The_DT seeds_NNS are_VBP purchased_VBN and_CC kept_VBN in_IN stock_NN by_IN druggists_NNS ,_, as_IN they_PRP are_VBP often_RB used_VBN medicinally_RB ._.

Charas_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT dusty_JJ exudation_NN of_IN the_DT bhang_NN plant_NN which_WDT oozes_VBZ out_RP from_IN the_DT inside_NN and_CC settles_NNS like_IN dew_NN on_IN the_DT leaves_NNS and_CC branches_NNS ,_, where_WRB it_PRP becomes_VBZ somewhat_RB dry_JJ and_CC solidifies_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ then_RB collected_VBN by_IN a_DT special_JJ process_NN and_CC brought_NN for_IN sale_NN to_TO these_DT countries_NNS (_( these_DT parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP )_) from_IN Kashmir_NNP and_CC Kabul_NNP ._.

The_DT ganja_NN plant_NN also_RB grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB and_CC resembles_VBZ the_DT bhang_NN plant_NN ._.

Third_JJ answer_NN ._.

Fourth_NNP (_( class_NN of_IN consumers_NNS or_CC )_) way_NN of_IN using_VBG the_DT drugs_NNS ._.

(_( a_DT )_) Habitual_NNP moderate_JJ consumers_NNS would_MD use_VB charas_JJ twice_RB or_CC thrice_JJ per_IN diem_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB spend_VB one_CD pice_NN or_CC two_CD pice_NN at_IN the_DT utmost_NN ;_: but_CC (_( b_NN )_) habitual_JJ ex-_JJ cessive_JJ consumers_NNS would_MD use_VB charas_JJ worth_JJ two_CD annas_NNS or_CC more_JJR ._.

1_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP C._NNP M._NNP RIVAS_NNP ,_, Officiating_NNP First_NNP Financial_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.

I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN twenty-nine_JJ years_NNS in_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Service_NNP ,_, all_DT in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP ._.

Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP G._NNP M._NNP OGILVIE_NNP ,_, Officiating_NNP Second_NNP Financial_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.

They_PRP were_VBD residents_NNS of_IN that_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
I_PRP formed_VBD the_DT belief_NN that_IN persons_NNS had_VBD got_VBN into_IN this_DT condition_NN from_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, from_IN personal_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN them_PRP ._.
They_PRP would_MD acknowledge_VB it_PRP themselves_PRP ._.
The_DT number_NN that_WDT came_VBD under_IN my_PRP$ personal_JJ ob-_JJ servation_NN was_VBD of_IN course_NN small_JJ ;_: but_CC from_IN hearsay_NN I_PRP am_VBP under_IN the_DT impression_NN that_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN taking_VBG the_DT drugs_NNS was_VBD very_RB prevalent_JJ among_IN the_DT lower_JJR classes_NNS of_IN population_NN of_IN Dera_NNP Ghazi_NNP Khan_NNP ._.
I_PRP can_MD recall_VB the_DT case_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN my_PRP$ own_JJ chapras-_JJ sis_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD a_DT Saiad_NNP ,_, and_CC originally_RB a_DT flue_JJ ath-_JJ letic_JJ man_NN ._.

He_PRP was_VBD about_RB 35_CD when_WRB he_PRP died_VBD ._.
I_PRP know_VBP of_IN no_DT peculiarity_NN of_IN the_DT Dera_NNP Ghazi_NNP Khan_NNP district_NN which_WDT should_MD render_VB the_DT hemp_NN habit_NN more_RBR prevalent_NN there_RB than_IN elsewhere_RB ._.
The_DT habit_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB spread_VBN over_IN Dera_NNP Ghazi_NNP Khan_NNP and_CC Multan_NNP ,_, but_CC I_PRP can_MD give_VB no_DT reason_NN for_IN it_PRP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ they_PRP are_VBP especially_RB hot_JJ and_CC dry_JJ districts_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB met_VBN any_DT natives_NNS whom_WP I_PRP could_MD call_VB physical_JJ wrecks_NNS from_IN alcohol_NN ,_, though_IN I_PRP have_VBP known_VBN hard_JJ drinkers_NNS ._.

I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO trace_VB any_DT connection_NN between_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC crime_NN ,_, and_CC can_MD not_RB form_VB any_DT opinion_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ large_JJ experience_NN as_IN a_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB recall_VB any_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT crime_NN was_VBD due_JJ either_RB to_TO the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS or_CC to_TO opium_VB ._.
Nor_CC do_VBP I_PRP remember_VB having_VBG ever_RB had_VBD to_TO punish_VB natives_NNS for_IN drunkenness_NN or_CC offences_NNS associated_VBN with_IN it_PRP ._.
My_PRP$ impression_NN is_VBZ that_IN riots_NNS in_IN towns_NNS may_MD sometimes_RB arise_VB from_IN liquor_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN Cantonment_NNP Magistrates_NNP might_MD tell_VB a_DT differ-_JJ ent_NN story_NN ,_, At_IN certain_JJ native_JJ festivals_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT Holi_NNP ,_, breaches_NNS of_IN the_DT peace_NN due_JJ to_TO excitement_VB caused_VBN by_IN liquor_NN are_VBP not_RB unfrequent_JJ ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT system_NN of_IN levying_VBG an_DT excise_NN both_DT upon_IN liquor_NN and_CC other_JJ intoxicants_NNS ,_, including_VBG under_IN that_DT head_NN both_DT opium_NN and_CC hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, is_VBZ entirely_RB defensible_JJ according_VBG to_TO the_DT principles_NNS which_WDT regulate_VBP the_DT administration_NN of_IN civilized_JJ countries_NNS ._.
The_DT main_JJ question_NN ,_, it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO me_PRP ,_, that_WDT can_MD arise_VB in_IN this_DT connection_NN is_VBZ whether_IN any_DT particular_JJ liquor_NN or_CC intoxicant_NN is_VBZ so_RB deleterious_JJ that_IN ,_, on_IN grounds_NNS both_DT of_IN morality_NN and_CC utility_NN its_PRP$ consumption_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB prohibited_VBN by_IN law_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN opium_NN ,_, at_IN least_JJS of_IN opium_NN eaten_NNS and_CC not_RB smoked_VBN ,_, my_PRP$ opinion_NN was_VBD that_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN was_VBD not_RB by_IN any_DT means_NNS proved_VBN to_TO be_VB so_RB deleterious_JJ as_IN would_MD warrant_VB any_DT Government_NNP in_IN prohibiting_VBG its_PRP$ consumption_NN by_IN law_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN taking_VBG such_JJ measures_NNS as_IN would_MD in_IN any_DT indirect_JJ manner_NN practically_RB stop_VB its_PRP$ consumption_NN ._.

I_PRP would_MD add_VB ,_, too_RB ,_, with_IN regard_NN to_TO charas_VB ,_, that_IN the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN its_PRP$ use_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB a_DT matter_NN of_IN much_JJ practical_JJ difficulty_NN because_IN the_DT drug_NN is_VBZ an_DT imported_JJ article_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, be_VB possible_JJ either_DT to_TO prohibit_VB its_PRP$ import_NN or_CC to_TO place_VB upon_IN it_PRP a_DT practically_RB prohibitive_JJ duty_NN ._.

I_PRP would_MD observe_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT Yarkand_NNP trade_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT imposition_NN of_IN a_DT duty_NN so_RB high_JJ as_IN to_TO be_VB practically_RB prohibitive_JJ would_MD very_RB consider-_VB ably_RB injure_NN that_IN trade_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT Yarkandi_NNP trader_NN ,_, in_IN exchange_NN for_IN the_DT charas_NN ,_, takes_VBZ back_RB the_DT products_NNS of_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ country_NN or_CC to_TO Kashmir_NNP ._.

On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, from_IN my_PRP$ personal_JJ knowledge_NN as_IN Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN the_DT Dera_NNP Ismail_NNP Khan_NNP District_NNP ,_, I_PRP would_MD say_VB that_IN no_DT harm_NN would_MD accrue_VB to_TO general_JJ trade_NN on_IN the_DT western_JJ border_NN from_IN the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN charas_NNS ._.
As_IN regards_NNS bhang_NN ,_, my_PRP$ opinion_NN is_VBZ that_IN it_PRP can_MD hardly_RB come_VB under_IN the_DT description_NN of_IN a_DT drug_NN which_WDT is_VBZ so_RB deleterious_JJ as_IN to_TO warrant_VB the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN its_PRP$ use_NN by_IN Government_NNP ._.
That_IN the_DT drug_NN is_VBZ deleterious_JJ is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, generally_RB admitted_VBN ;_: but_CC I_PRP very_RB much_RB doubt_NN if_IN it_PRP can_MD be_VB described_VBN as_IN deleterious_JJ to_TO that_DT extent_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ another_DT very_RB important_JJ consideration_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN bhang_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ this_DT :_: that_IN the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN its_PRP$ use_NN is_VBZ practically_RB impossible_JJ owing_VBG to_TO the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT it_PRP grows_VBZ wild_JJ and_CC the_DT ease_NN with_IN which_WDT it_PRP can_MD be_VB manufactured_VBN for_IN consumption_NN ._.
After_IN giving_VBG some_DT consideration_NN to_TO the_DT point_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP practically_RB arrived_VBN at_IN the_DT opinion_NN that_IN the_DT present_JJ system_NN by_IN which_WDT this_DT drug_NN can_MD only_RB be_VB sold_VBN by_IN licensed_JJ vendors_NNS is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT only_RB practicable_JJ system_NN of_IN taxing_VBG it_PRP ._.
By_IN saying_VBG that_IN a_DT tax_NN should_MD be_VB practically_RB pro-_JJ hibitive_NN ,_, I_PRP mean_VBP that_IN it_PRP should_MD he_PRP fixed_VB so_RB high_JJ as_IN to_TO place_VB the_DT commodity_NN beyond_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN any_DT but_CC very_RB rich_JJ people_NNS ._.
Where_WRB prohibition_NN is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD fix_VB the_DT tax_NN as_RB high_JJ as_IN possible_JJ consistently_RB with_IN leaving_VBG the_DT commodity_NN within_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT latter_JJ case_NN ,_, the_DT object_NN would_MD be_VB the_DT object_NN of_IN all_DT excise_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, to_TO derive_VB 361_CD revenue_NN and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN to_TO lessen_VB consump-_JJ tion_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB my_PRP$ object_NN that_IN restriction_NN should_MD be_VB con-_JJ fined_VBN to_TO the_DT poor_JJ ;_: but_CC I_PRP would_MD observe_VB that_IN a_DT tax_NN which_WDT tends_VBZ to_TO raise_VB the_DT price_NN of_IN a_DT commodity_NN of_IN necessity_NN places_NNS that_WDT commodity_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN the_DT very_RB poor_JJ ._.
I_PRP think_VBP charas_NNS is_VBZ certainly_RB not_RB taxed_VBN sufficiently_RB high_JJ with_IN reference_NN to_TO other_JJ intoxicants_NNS ._.
At_IN present_PDT the_DT only_JJ tax_NN upon_IN charas_NN is_VBZ that_IN derived_VBN from_IN licenses_NNS for_IN sale_NN ._.

Under_IN this_DT Act_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ within_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN Government_NNP to_TO impose_VB a_DT duty_NN on_IN any_DT intoxicating_JJ drug_NN brought_VBN by_IN land_NN from_IN beyond_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN India_NNP into_IN any_DT territory_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT Act_NNP extends_VBZ ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB in_IN contemplation_NN to_TO impose_VB such_PDT a_DT duty_NN ,_, though_IN the_DT exact_JJ amount_NN of_IN the_DT duty_NN and_CC the_DT method_NN of_IN its_PRP$ collection_NN have_VBP not_RB as_IN yet_RB been_VBN finally_RB decided_VBN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT duty_NN should_MD certainly_RB not_RB be_VB fixed_VBN at_IN such_PDT an_DT amount_NN as_IN to_TO extinguish_VB the_DT Yarkand_NNP trade_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP am_VBP inclined_VBN to_TO the_DT opinion_NN that_IN a_DT moderate_JJ duty_NN should_MD be_VB first_JJ impo_NN ed_NN which_WDT might_MD be_VB gradually_RB raised_VBN in_IN succeeding_VBG years_NNS ._.

43_CD ._.

Charas_NNP is_VBZ imported_VBN from_IN Yarkand_NNP and_CC by_IN way_NN of_IN Kashmir_NNP ._.

Charas_NNP comes_VBZ in_IN from_IN Yarkand_NNP and_CC by_IN way_NN of_IN Kashmir_NNP and_CC Ladakh_NNP ._.

5_CD ._.

1_CD ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT dried_VBN leaves_NNS have_VBP various_JJ names_NNS ._.

The_DT green_JJ leaves_NNS (_( or_CC the_DT plant_NN )_) are_VBP sometimes_RB called_VBN buti_NN skhi_NN ,_, or_CC bhokar_NN ._.
In_IN Bashahr_NNP both_CC the_DT green_JJ and_CC dried_JJ leaves_NNS are_VBP called_VBN bhangra_NN ._.

365_CD 3_CD ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) Simla_NNP district_NN up_RB to_TO at_IN least_JJS 7,000_CD feet_NNS and_CC Simla_NNP Hill_NNP States_NNPS ._.

4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.
It_PRP grows_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, most_JJS readily_RB in_IN climates_NNS with_IN a_DT fairly_RB good_JJ rainfall_NN :_: and_CC seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB specially_RB common_JJ in_IN the_DT rich_JJ soil_NN of_IN waste_NN places_NNS near_IN villages_NNS (_( thus_RB growing_VBG under_IN somewhat_RB simi-_JJ lar_JJ conditions_NNS to_TO the_DT nettle_NN )_) ._.

7_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Simla_NNP district_NN (_( as_IN generally_RB in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP submontane_NN )_) hemp_NN is_VBZ commonly_RB grown_VBN for_IN its_PRP$ fibre_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ made_VBN into_IN ropes_NNS for_IN ordinary_JJ use_NN ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP know_VBP ,_, hemp_FW is_VBZ not_RB cultivated_VBN in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN charas_NNS or_CC ganja_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN use_NN as_IN bhang_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, seen_VBN it_PRP culti-_JJ vated_VBD as_IN a_DT drug_NN or_CC food_NN in_IN the_DT State_NNP of_IN Bashahr_NNP ,_, at_IN 7,000_CD or_CC 8,000_CD feet_NNS where_WRB it_PRP produces_VBZ a_DT resin_NN ._.
Here_RB and_CC elsewhere_RB its_PRP$ seeds_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB mixed_JJ with_IN food_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
Villagers_NNS in_IN the_DT hills_NNS in_IN the_DT cold_JJ season_NN occasionally_RB roast_VBD its_PRP$ seeds_NNS and_CC mix_VB them_PRP with_IN parched_JJ wheat_NN or_CC bthu_NN (_( amaranthus_RB )_) ,_, or_CC with_IN rice_NN ._.
This_DT they_PRP call_VBP mra_NNS or_CC muri_NN ._.
Ropes_NNS are_VBP made_VBN of_IN the_DT fibre_JJ both_DT of_IN the_DT culti-_NN vated_VBD and_CC wild_JJ plants_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT fibre_NN from_IN the_DT culti-_NN vated_JJ plant_NN is_VBZ much_RB stronger_JJR ._.
Bhang_NNP can_MD be_VB procured_VBN from_IN both_DT cultivated_VBN and_CC wild_JJ plants_NNS ._.
In_IN Bashahr_NNP its_PRP$ seeds_NNS ,_, parched_VBN and_CC crushed_VBN ,_, yield_VB an_DT oil_NN (_( bhang_NN ka_NNP tel_NN )_) ._.

9_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP given_VBN to_TO understand_VB that_IN the_DT soil_NN is_VBZ turned_VBN up_RP only_RB once_RB and_CC the_DT seeds_NNS sown_VBN ,_, No_DT particular_JJ care_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN in_IN the_DT cultivation_NN ._.
11_CD ._.

14_CD ._.

Bhang_NNP is_VBZ very_RB commonly_RB used_VBN ;_: but_CC no_DT special_JJ preparation_NN of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ required_VBN :_: the_DT leaves_NNS ,_, simply_RB dried_VBN ,_, form_VB the_DT drug_NN ._.
15_CD ._.
(_( A_DT )_) Charas_NNP ,_, of_IN a_DT kind_NN ,_, is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN these_DT hills_NNS ,_, though_RB ,_, 1_CD think_NN ,_, not_RB to_TO any_DT very_RB large_JJ extent_NN ,_, by_IN rubbing_VBG the_DT fresh_JJ leaves_NNS and_CC seeds_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN between_IN the_DT hands_NNS ,_, scraping_VBG the_DT adher-_JJ ent_NN resin_NN off_IN the_DT hands_NNS with_IN a_DT knife_NN ,_, and_CC making_VBG it_PRP into_IN little_JJ pills_NNS for_IN smoking_NN in_IN the_DT huka_NN ._.
(_( B_NNP )_) The_DT seeds_NNS are_VBP eaten_VBN ,_, and_CC appear_VB to_TO be_VB parched_VBN or_CC roasted_VBN before_IN being_VBG mixed_JJ with_IN food_NN ._.
(_( C_NNP )_) The_DT leaves_NNS are_VBP dried_VBN and_CC kept_VBN in_IN some_DT vessel_NN ,_, commonly_RB perhaps_RB in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP in_IN a_DT matka_NN ,_, or_CC earthen_VB jar_NN ,_, till_NN required_VBN for_IN use_NN ._.

Appendix_NNP TO_NNP MR._NNP DAMES_NNP '_POS evidence_NN ._.
Memorandum_NN on_IN the_DT petition_NN for_IN some_DT reduction_NN of_IN the_DT sentence_NN of_IN transportation_NN for_IN life_NN pass-_JJ ed_NN on_IN Kalu_NNP Khan_NNP on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD February_NNP 1892_CD ._.
This_DT petition_NN was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO me_PRP at_IN Fort_NNP Munro_NNP by_IN the_DT assembled_JJ Tumaudars_NNP of_IN the_DT Dera_NNP Ghazi_NNP Khan_NNP and_CC Thal_NNP Chotiali_NNP district_NN in_IN September_NNP 1892_CD ._.

The_DT facts_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :377_CD ing_VBG him_PRP blood_JJ money_NN ._.
Jalal_NNP at_IN present_JJ remains_NNS obdurate_JJ ,_, but_CC there_EX is_VBZ every_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN if_IN clemency_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN to_TO Kalu_NNP Khan_NNP there_RB will_MD he_PRP no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN satisfying_VBG Jalal_NNP by_IN the_DT grant_NN of_IN land_NN or_CC money_NN either_CC by_IN private_JJ arbitration_NN or_CC by_IN the_DT award_NN of_IN a_DT jirga_NN ._.
R._NNP E._NNP YOUNGHUSBAND_NNP Dated_NNP 9th_CD April_NNP 1893_CD ._.

229-8._JJ ,_, dated_JJ 16th_CD June_NNP 1893_CD ,_, from_IN R._NNP E._NNP Younghusband_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, Officiating_NNP Junior_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN the_DT Pun-_NNP jab_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT Commissioner_NNP and_CC Superintendent_NNP ,_, Derajat_NNP Division_NNP ._.

13_CD of_IN 1880_CD ._.
(_( a_DT )_) In_IN Kulu_NNP Proper_NNP ,_, including_VBG Plach_NNP ._.
the_DT area_NN under_IN hemp_JJ cultivation_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO be_VB 72_CD acres_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, 33_CD acres_NNS in_IN Kulu_NNP ,_, and_CC 39_CD acres_NNS in_IN Plach_NNP ._.

in_IN Lahoul_NNP the_DT extent_NN of_IN cultivation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN roughly_RB calculated_VBN at_IN 1_CD acre_NN ._.
Almost_RB every_DT house_NN has_VBZ a_DT small_JJ patch_NN near_IN it_PRP ,_, a_DT long_JJ strip_NN beside_IN a_DT hedge_NN or_CC a_DT small_JJ bed_NN ,_, a_DT few_JJ square_NN yards_NNS in_IN area_NN ._.

(_( 5_CD )_) The_DT hemp_NN plant_NN grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB in_IN all_DT three_CD parts_NNS of_IN this_DT sub-division_NN ,_, and_CC considerable_JJ areas_NNS in_IN Kulu_NNP and_CC Plach_NNP ;_: but_CC if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO form_VB an_DT accurate_JJ estimate_NN of_IN the_DT extent_NN of_IN culti-_JJ vation_NN ,_, how_WRB much_RB more_RBR difficult_JJ in_IN case_NN of_IN spon-_JJ taneous_JJ growth_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ found_VBN on_IN hill_NN sides_NNS in_IN the_DT jungle_NN ._.

(_( e_NN )_) There_EX is_VBZ no_DT export_NN nor_CC import_NN of_IN hemp_NN leaves_NNS ._.
Kangra_NNP Proper_NNP also_RB produces_VBZ the_DT wild_JJ plant_NN in_IN great_JJ quantity_NN ._.

(_( f_NN )_) So_RB far_RB as_IN this_DT sub-division_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, any_DT restriction_NN on_IN the_DT cultivation_NN is_VBZ in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN uncalled_VBD for_IN ._.
The_DT area_NN under_IN hemp_JJ cultivation_NN is_VBZ small_JJ ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN bhangolu_NN ,_, no_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN purposes_NNS of_IN intoxication_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ cultivated_VBN exclusively_RB for_IN fibre_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT seed_NN is_VBZ a_DT mere_JJ accident_NN ._.
If_IN licenses_NNS were_VBD required_VBN ,_, zamindars_NNS would_MD be_VB obliged_VBN to_TO buy_VB the_DT fibre_NN or_CC turn_NN to_TO the_DT nettle_NN plant_NN which_WDT in_IN Kulu_NNP grows_NNS to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ height_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT supplies_VBZ a_DT fibre_NN already_RB used_VBN for_IN common_JJ purposes_NNS ._.
The_DT hemp_NN fibre_NN is_VBZ here_RB used_VBN principally_RB where_WRB strength_NN is_VBZ required_VBN without_IN great_JJ bulk_NN of_IN fibre_NN ._.
As_IN to_TO regulation_NN of_IN the_DT sale_NN and_CC storing_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN leaves_NNS ,_, that_WDT seems_VBZ to_TO me_PRP an_DT impossibili-_JJ ty_NN or_CC nearly_RB so_RB in_IN the_DT hills_NNS ,_, were_VBD the_DT plant_NN grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB in_IN such_JJ quantities_NNS ._.
The_DT evasion_NN of_IN any_DT rules_NNS laid_VBN down_RP would_MD be_VB so_RB easy_JJ ,_, and_CC any_DT attempt_NN to_TO carry_VB them_PRP out_RP would_MD involve_VB so_RB much_JJ interference_NN that_IN they_PRP would_MD probably_RB remain_VB a_DT dead_JJ letter_NN ._.

The_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN in_IN Kulu_NNP is_VBZ not_RB so_RB excessive_JJ as_IN in_IN itself_PRP to_TO call_VB for_IN interference_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB sufficiently_RB acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT circum-_JJ stances_NNS of_IN other_JJ districts_NNS to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO express_VB an_DT opinion_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT general_JJ question_NN ,_, but_CC there_EX are_VBP always_RB and_CC in_IN all_DT places_NNS two_CD great_JJ differences_NNS between_IN the_DT poppy_JJ and_CC the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ;_: the_DT former_JJ does_VBZ not_RB grow_VB wild_NN ,_, the_DT latter_NN does_VBZ ;_: the_DT former_JJ is_VBZ cultivated_VBN only_RB for_IN the_DT drug_NN it_PRP produces_VBZ ,_, the_DT latter_NN is_VBZ cultivated_VBN for_IN its_PRP$ fibre_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN for_IN its_PRP$ drug_NN ._.
These_DT differences_NNS are_VBP so_RB radical_JJ that_IN they_PRP appear_VBP to_TO me_PRP to_TO show_VB that_IN hemp_JJ cultivation_NN must_MD be_VB put_VBN on_IN a_DT different_JJ footing_NN from_IN poppy_JJ cultivation_NN ,_, and_CC can_MD not_RB be_VB made_VBN subject_JJ to_TO the_DT same_JJ restrictions_NNS ._.
11_CD ._.

1_CD ._.
No_DT special_JJ opportunities_NNS at_IN any_DT time_NN except_VBZ that_IN as_IN Junior_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Financial_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN in_IN 1884_CD ,_, and_CC one_CD or_CC two_CD previous_JJ years_NNS I_PRP compiled_VBD excise_NN reports_NNS ._.

1_CD ._.

Charas-smoking_NN is_VBZ most_RBS common_JJ ,_, and_CC most_JJS carried_VBN to_TO excess_VB among_IN the_DT different_JJ Saiva_NNP orders_NNS of_IN Hindu_NNP sadhus_NN ;_: and_CC among_IN these_DT again_RB ,_, with_IN those_DT that_WDT are_VBP sedentary_JJ or_CC collected_VBN in_IN monasteries_NNS ._.
Nagas_NNP ,_, gosains_NNS ,_, bairagis_NN and_CC jogis_NN ,_, both_DT Hindus_NNP and_CC Muhammadan_NNP jogis_NN ,_, are_VBP commonly_RB given_VBN over_RP to_TO charas-smoking_NN ._.

18_CD ._.

(_( 4_CD )_) ._.

The_DT evil_NN has_VBZ crept_VBN into_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP from_IN Lucknow_NNP and_CC other_JJ cities_NNS of_IN India_NNP This_DT drug_NN (_( ?_. )_)
is_VBZ first_RB used_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS as_IN an_DT aphrodisiac_NN ,_, and_CC possibly_RB with_IN some_DT beneficial_JJ result_NN ;_: but_CC afterwards_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT habit_NN is_VBZ formed_VBN ,_, the_DT drug_NN does_VBZ not_RB produce_VB any_DT such_JJ effect_NN ._.
